snippet: Kenneth R. Feinberg, administrator of the $20 billion fund created to pay damages from the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill, has reopened the cash window.
abstract: Kenneth R. Feinberg, administrator of the $20 billion fund created to pay damages from the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill, orders that payments should resume following Nov 7 halt.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth R. Feinberg, administrator of the $20 billion fund created to pay damages from the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill, has reopened the cash window.

headline.main: Louisiana: Payments for Gulf Spill Resume
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Payments For Gulf Spill Resume
